column5: This probably doesn't interest a whole bunch of folks but I'm as happy as a pig in poop right now. Had a new motor installed on my tinny this morning. The thing's a monster compared to what I had. I still have just a few little things to do around the house then I'm going for a maiden run. And yes, it's a TILLER! WOOOOOOOOOHOOOOOOOOO!
Fly my son fly. Dont forget yer PFD BUD.
That thing oughtta skip across the water pretty good now!!!  I'm guessin' you'll get 40 mph out of it!
Ouais... On se gatte!!  Warp speed captain..  ENGAGE!!  Bien joue grand!  N'oublie pas ton manteau de sauvetage..  cheers HD
Garde ton chapeau!
A thing of beauty fer sure Roy & yer gonna luv that 4 stroke   No more smoke, no more noise, no oil to mix & you'll troll all day without fouling your plugs.
I like that one...   Looks like an awesome piece of kit you got there.....i'm not jealous.
Be sure to check your Dilithium Crystals before you headout!!!
ya whats the HP on it.
Holy Smokes Roy! Ya better wear a helmet flying that around the lake!    Mon Dieu!
Let us know how she flies Roy. Should move her across the water real well!
Sure is pretty  Maureen
Try to not fall asleep with this one....  you might not end up going in circles this time.....
So when are you going to get the really big pick up truck to go with that thing. The new motors sure are a thing of beauty bud cant wait to see you/it at lak air this year.  Art
....Good golly! Now I'll get to see what me own motor looks like from behind. Very nice Roy.
That's awesome hon, I'm so happy for you.  I guess we won't be taking any more "shortcuts" through the shallows on the Larry anymore eh  Just super hon!!!  Joey
Good for you bud... but i think we must be paying you too much!
Oooooooh....Ahhhh......TILLER  Looking good roy. I could use one just like that on mine. Is that a 50 or a 60? What was on it before?  Can't wait to hear about the maiden voyage!  Sinker
She's a beauty Roy.
Nice motor Roy. Didn't you have a console set up in your boat previous to this new tiller ?
BLASPHEMY!
hey roy...nice motor..
always great to start off the warm weather fishing season with a nice upgrade on the toys
Beauty motor ,congrats, I prefer tiller as well,does it come in BRP white lol JK enjoy her

Congrats bud so did it help you catch more fish .I gave you a call yesterday your wife said you were ot fishin I think you were out for a joy ride because we don't see any fish pics.  How does it troll?  My buddy Kenny has the 60 Merc and it trolls nice and slow.  You know my kids soccer has not started during the week yet so all I need is an invite.  My boat or yours?  Enjoy man 24mph is going to be a thing of the past now
